```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)

sales <- read_excel("./Hardware sales.xlsx") 

sales2 <- sales %>% select(c(Hardware,Region,Day,Year,Month,Sales)) %>% mutate(Sold = (Sales/1000))
sales2$Date <- as.Date(with(sales2, paste(Year,Month,Day, sep="-")),"%Y-%m-%d")
```

```{r}
#line graph 

ggplot(sales2, aes(x = Date, y = Sold, color = Hardware)) + geom_line()
```

```{r}
#stream graph (going to change colors)
library(ggstream)

ggplot(sales2, aes(x = Date, y = Sold, fill = Hardware)) + geom_stream()
```
```{r}
ggplot(sales2, aes(x = Date, y = Sold, fill = Hardware)) + geom_stream(type = "ridge")
```
